name: Redemption
body:
## Welcome to WoW-Mania Redemption Realm (Bug Tracker)

READ CAREFULLY:

Before entering any issue/bug please search the repository and make sure it was not already reported by someone else. If it was do not create a new one, just comment and confirm the existing one adding any missing detail.

Please use the following tags for bug titles:

* [Quest] - Any quest related issue
* [NPC] - Any mob or NPC issue
* [Item] - Any item or gameobject issue
* [Map] - Any map issue
* [Spell] - Any spell, ability or skill
* [Core] - Any core issue (code)
* [Achievement] - Any achievement related issue

When entering an issue please follow this procedure:

Give name and id to the related object/mob/quest (check wowhead.com)
Described the issue. What is actually happening (actual behaviour).
Describe what you think it should be happening (expected behaviour).
Additional information (i.e.: is it a quest chain, is it a class specific)

### Authors and Contributors
WoW-Mania is a community effort and players are encouraged to contribute any way they can. This is a brief list of our current GMs and Mods:

* Janitor - GM, Dev
* Deacon - Mod
* Mtrx - Mod
* Gabriel - Mod
* Norrell - Mod

### Support or Contact
Feel free to contact us vi email, skype or facebook:
* e-mail: support@wow-mania.com
* skype: wow-mania.com
* facebook: wowmaniauk
* forum: www.wow-mania.com/forum
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
